title: Janitor

fields.name: Hide:
fields.value: You will receive a list of players, the size of which is proportional to your score. You may choose one to hide for the Night, causing any visits to them to receive the "Your target was missing!" feedback. This doesn't impact Astral abilities. This cannot self-target.

fields.name: Huddled Into the Broom Closet (x0, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Target a player during the Evening who was on your most receent Hide list. Both you and your target will be under the effects of Hide, be roleblocked, and share a chat for the following Night phase.

desc:
Post 203
*Nobody ever looks in the broom closet.* (Role concept from ADW's School Mafia)
